response.original_title: La Desaz√≥n Suprema: retrato de Fernando Vallejo
response.overview: Freely expressing his loves and hates, controversial Colombian and openly gay writer Fernando Vallejo (living in Mexico) breaks with an ingrained literary tradition: that of the omniscient writer who sees and knows everything. The film covers his literary output and his many interests: film, music, science, and politics. Made with the full support and participation of the author, it provides a portrait of one of the best Spanish-language writers.
response.title: The Supreme Uneasiness: Incessant Portrait of Fernando Vallejo
